snippet: One pedestrian was killed and two others critically injured when a taxi jumped a curb along the Grand Concourse in the Bronx on Friday night, the police said.
abstract: Taxi cab jumps curb in Bronx, killing one pedestrian and critically injuring two others.
lead_paragraph: One pedestrian was killed and two others critically injured when a taxi jumped a curb along the Grand Concourse in the Bronx on Friday night, the police said.

headline.main: Taxi Jumps Curb, Killing Pedestrian in the Bronx
